Tecmo's Online PC RPG: Bastard!!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): Tecmo's Online PC RPG: Bastard!!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, July 21, 2005 - 06:20 pm:

Tecmo anounces creation of exclusively online game “Bastard!! Online.”
The popular comic “Bastard!! -- Destroying God of Darkness” is being
originated as an online RPG.

Tecmo Inc.announced the fact that it is producing an exclusively online game
“Bastard!! Online” (PC/AT networking OS, Japanese edition). “Bastard!!
Online,” Hagiwara Kazushi’s popular comic “Bastard!! Destroying God of
Darkness” is being made as a multiperson online RPG. Tecmo obtained permission to convert this original work into an online game and developed it as an IT venture with the Shaft corporation.

“Bastard!! Online” is Tecmo’s first multiplayer online game project, and is a serious entry one-shot title. It is scheduled to begin service in 2006.

You can read about the anime here: Bastard!!
